00033   void Util::normalize_pathname(String name, String &normal_name) {
00034     normal_name = "";
00035     if (name[0] != '/')
00036       normal_name += "/";
00037 
00038     if (name.find('/', name.length()-1) == String::npos)
00039       normal_name += name;
00040     else
00041       normal_name += name.substr(0, name.length()-1);
00042   }
00043 
00044   uint64_t Util::get_handle(std::string name) {
00045     String normal_name;
00046 
00047     normalize_pathname(name, normal_name);
00048 
00049     HsClientState::FileMap::iterator iter =
00050         HsClientState::file_map.find(normal_name);
00051     if (iter == HsClientState::file_map.end())
00052       HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_PARSE_ERROR, "Unable to find '%s' in open "
00053                 "file map", normal_name.c_str());
00054 
00055     return (*iter).second;
00056   }
